mapper.select: SELECT A.ADDR_ID addrId , B.CD_NAME addrName , COUNT(*) cnt , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_RESULT) total FROM TBL_RESULT A, TBL_CODE B WHERE SUBSTR(ADDR_ID FROM 1 FOR 2) = B.CD AND B.CD_TYPE = '1' GROUP BY SUBSTR(ADDR_ID FROM 1 FOR 2) ORDER BY CNT DESC

SELECT A.CARE_ADDR_ID addrId , B.CD_NAME addrName , COUNT(*) cnt , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_RESULT) total FROM TBL_RESULT A, TBL_CODE B WHERE SUBSTR(CARE_ADDR_ID FROM 1 FOR 2) = B.CD AND B.CD_TYPE = '1' GROUP BY SUBSTR(CARE_ADDR_ID FROM 1 FOR 2) ORDER BY CNT DESC

SELECT A.CARE_ID careId , B.CD_NAME careName , COUNT(*) cnt , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_RESULT) total FROM TBL_RESULT A, TBL_CODE B WHERE A.CARE_ID = B.CD AND B.CD_TYPE = '3'
AND ADDR_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{addrId},'%')
GROUP BY A.CARE_ID ORDER BY CNT DESC

SELECT CAST(AVG(DISTANCE) AS CHAR(10)) distance FROM TBL_RESULT
WHERE ADDR_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{addrId},'%')

SELECT A.CARE_ADDR_ID addrId , B.CD_NAME addrName , COUNT(*) cnt FROM TBL_RESULT A, TBL_CODE B WHERE SUBSTR(CARE_ADDR_ID FROM 1 FOR 2) = B.CD AND B.CD_TYPE = '1'
AND ADDR_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{addrId},'%') AND CARE_ADDR_ID NOT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{addrId},'%')
GROUP BY SUBSTR(CARE_ADDR_ID FROM 1 FOR 2) ORDER BY CNT DESC
